name: spliting values
message
format: Description To implement the automation in the field of medicine and to minimize the Physical supervision of a Doctor. We are presenting a Smart T-shirt which monitors the health parameters of a child 24 hours, this system is connected to a Private server, it consists of several sensors to measure the physical parameters i.e., Temperature sensors, Pulse-oximetry sensor, Accelerometer sensor, Gyroscope sensor. As this is a smart T-shirt, an Android app is connected to the smart T-shirt, with that app we can check the analyzed report and Monitor the live parameter. In addition, this T-shirt includes a spy camera to check the child activity through the live stream over the Internet. The Proposed system is programmed to automatically give a warning alert to the connected users in case of any abnormal health condition through telegram application. i.e., heat strokes, cold strokes, low pulse or any kind of physical injuries, this data is sent to the app over the internet, the warning alert will be sent over telegram Messenger app.

name: Clock Toolbar
format:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">
    $('#clock').remove();
    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    var div = $('<div/>');
    var p = $('<p/ id="clock">');
    
    $('#titleScript').parent().hide();
    div.append(p);
    div[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';
    toolbar.append(div);

    function displayTitle(lh) {
        p.text(lh); 
    }
    
    function upTime() {
        var d = new Date();
        p.text(d.toLocaleTimeString('de-AT'));
    }

    

    // Watch the payload and update the title
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
            displayTitle(data);
        });
        setInterval(upTime,1000);
    })(scope);
</script>

msg.payload="Uploading Your Settings..."
return msg;
